title: Oho Enthan Baby
overview: Ashwin goes to actor Vishnu Vishal’s office to pitch a script and ends up narrating his love story. What the actor thinks to be an interval is Ashwin’s climax, it actually is a stoic end to his romantic relationship with Meera. With Vishnu Vishal’s pursual, Ashwin must confront his former lover again, to complete his story and begin his debut directorial.
